page.title: 14GLASSARY PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content:
GLASSARY PRIMARY SCHOOL WAS BUILT MORE THAN ONE HUNDRED YEARS AGO. AT PRESENT THERE ARE 39 CHILDREN ENROLLED AT THE SCHOOL WITH TWO TEACHERS. PRIMARY 1 HAS 11 CHILDREN PRIMARY 2 HAS 6 CHILDREN PRIMARY 3 HAS 6 CHILDREN
PRIMARY 4 HAS 6 CHILDREN PRIMARY 5 HAS 1 CHILD PRIMARY 6 HAS 4 CHIDREN PRIMARY 7 HAS 4 CHILDREN
MISS ELAIN GRAY TEACHES 23 INFANTS AND MR. ROBERT MCNEIL, HEAD TEACHER, TEACHES 15 SENIOR PUPILS. THE CHILDRENS' AGES RANGE FROM 5 TO 12+. ON COMPLETION OF THEIR PRIMARY EDUCATION ALL CHILDREN TRAVEL TO THE NEAREST SECONDARY SCHOOL, WHICH IS LOCHGILPHEAD HIGH.
